<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Updates the backlog type of stories.</description> <name>Update backlog type of stories</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var mUpdate = new GlideMultipleUpdate('rm_story'); mUpdate.addNotNullQuery('product'); mUpdate.setValue('backlog_type', 'product'); mUpdate.execute();
mUpdate = new GlideMultipleUpdate('rm_story'); mUpdate.addNullQuery('product'); mUpdate.setValue('backlog_type', 'oneoff'); mUpdate.execute();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2014-11-20 05:38:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b445f8b09f203100598a5bb0657fcf17</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update backlog type of stories</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">e119649247403110020ba9f8536d4366</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b445f8b09f203100598a5bb0657fcf17</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2014-11-20 05:47:03</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
